mapper.insert: insert into TEAMRANK(team_no, rank, TeamName, TeamImage, game, win, draw, loss, score, lossPoint, gapScore, point, season, leagueName) values((select nvl(max(team_no),0)+1 as team_no from TEAMRANK), #{rank}, #{TeamName}, #{TeamImage}, #{game}, #{win}, #{draw}, #{loss}, #{score}, #{lossPoint}, #{gapScore}, #{point}, #{t_season}, #{t_leagueName})
mapper.delete: delete from TEAMRANK where season = #{t_season} AND leagueName = #{t_leagueName}
